 Lemma for distributive law: cancellation of common factor.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Sep-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-May-2013.)
statement: mulcanenq $p |- ( ( A e. N. /\ B e. N. /\ C e. N. ) -> <. ( A .N B ) , ( A .N C ) >. ~Q <. B , C >. ) $.
